metadata.title: CVE-2023-25743 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A lack of in app notification for entering fullscreen mode could have leadto a malicious website spoofing browser chrome.
*This bug only affectsFirefox Focus. Other versions of Firefox are unaffected.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 110 and Firefox ESR < 102.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
